Installation

unisolver Installation

To use unisolver, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install unisolver

quadprog Installation

Quadprog is a light solver which is free. To use quadprog, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install quadprog

For more details, please refer to quadprog installation

Gurobi Installation

Gurobi is a solver also a commercial product. It is free to use for individual development and academic purpose. However, user need to pay if it is for company or commercial use. To use Gurobi, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install Gurobi

For more details, please refer to Gurobi installation

After having an idea about what unisolver is and installation, let’s move to the procedure about how to use unisolver to help solving optimization problems.
